verses.name: Ezekiel 18:26
verses.text: When a righteous man turneth away from his righteousness, and committeth iniquity, and dieth in them; for his iniquity that he hath done shall he die.

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:27
verses.text: Again, when the wicked man turneth away from his wickedness that he hath committed, and doeth that which is lawful and right, he shall save his soul alive.

verses.name: Ezekiel 18:28
verses.text: Because he considereth, and turneth away from all his transgressions that he hath committed, he shall surely live, he shall not die.
